name: Flappy Ship
description:
Prepare yourself for classic arcade action! How far can you flap? Glide through a retro space assault course of asteroids, aliens and buildings visually inspired by the likes of Canabalt and Jetpack Joyride.

Packed with exciting features:

  • Unlock new ships, each with unique accolades, through different achievements!
  • Beat your high score!
  • Dodge nefarious robots!
  • Collect power-ups!
  • Retro graphics and sound effects! (soundtrack coming soon)
  • Explore the retro world!
  • Challenging game-play for hours of flapping fun!
